group_1.textRight: I'm sorry...
I know you came all the way out here, but@I'm afraid I don't have any other information.
While things had certainly gotten hectic@at the Coordinator's shop,
I don't have much else to talk about.

group_1.textLeft: I see...
But even that information is worth knowing.
Thank you very much!

group_1.textRight: Hey, I've been wondering!@What's your dad like?

group_1.textLeft: He's a nice man.

group_1.textRight: No, I didn't mean personality-wise...

group_1.textLeft: You mean what he looks like?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that! Just hearing his description@might ring a bell.
Yeah, we might have crossed paths with him@without realizing it.
Do you have a photo of him, by any chance...?

group_1.textLeft: I have one on my phone.
...Yes, this is it.

group_1.textRight: Yep yep!
Are you sure this is a recent photo? He looks just@the same as he did when he interviewed me.

group_1.textLeft: He's chosen clothes that are easiest for him@to facilitate fieldwork.
And because of his field of study, he doesn't@need to dress formally.

group_1.textRight: His hair is kind of grown out...@Does he have a perm?

group_1.textLeft: No, that's his natural hair.
I've gotten it from him, actually.@It can be very hard to rein in.

group_1.textRight: Oh, same here...

group_1.textLeft: You know how difficult it is, then.

group_1.textRight: Yes, like rainy days, for example...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, my hair gets so stiff. I look like@a completely different person.

group_1.textRight: I think this talk about hair is getting@us off track.
Oh, s-sorry...

group_1.textLeft: You're fine.
His glasses are really round.

group_1.textRight: They're awesome! He looks like one of those@cartoon insect nerds!

group_1.textLeft: A...cartoon insect nerd?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, those guys! It's cool, though.

group_1.textLeft: Look, I didn't come here to have you all@judge his appearance!
I'd rather you tell me if any of you have@seen him before.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm sorry, I don't think I have.
Well...he's the kind of guy who would really@stick out if you saw him...

group_1.textLeft: I don't recall having seen him.

group_1.textRight: I was at Touka's hospital for a really long time...@but I don't think I've seen him there.

group_1.textLeft: No, I don't remember him, either...

group_1.textRight: Same here.

group_1.textCenter: I see. Thank you, all of you.

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry we weren't any help...
Y'know, why don't you go ask Touka?
You guys are related, right?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103701:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Touka...!

group_1.textRight: Oh?
You've got some nerve bringing her up...
But she does have a point.
I think you two should try to mediate and find@common ground, despite your differences.

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry. I can't count the number of times@I've considered that option,
but I cannot rely on her.
I can't trust the information I've received@from her.

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: I...do apologize for being so stubborn.

group_1.textRight: Nayuta...

group_1.textCenter: I cannot stand Touka or my uncle.
